page.title: 10CUSTOMS,SAUNDERSFOOT.
page.content: Saundersfoot children play the following games. Boys Girls Football Elastic Volley Ball Rounders Rugby Mob British Bulldog Stickey Glue Line Touch Purple Poison Elastic is played with a long piece of elastic with the ends tied together. Two people stand inside the circle of elastic and stretch it apart with their legs astride about 15 inches. Then another person makes up a game by jumping in,out,on and over the elastic First you jump,then hop,jump backwards ,walk,gallop and twirl on it. Then you close your legs and that is called thins and then use one foot which is called double thins.The elastic is held higher on the knees,thighs and backside,waist and arm pits to make it
